Articles.Content: I swear I downloaded it right, there evwn was that part. But there are no BD toolbars

Are you sure you have the correct version?

Try redownloading on a fresh install.  Only place the items in the folder into gamedata, and make sure you have no extra modulemanagers or anything. Can't think of much else.

Hi @Joseph Kerman, welcome to the forum

I bring to your attention the following thread where the BDA Continued team has kept Baha's mods up to date as KSP has gone up in versions ... Please read the OP where it describes the correct installation method as well as providing links to the latest version of BDAc and other Baha family mods that we maintain:
